product_name: REI Merino Wool Light Hiker Quarter Socks - 2012 Seconds
long_description: Keep your feet cool and comfortable on your next quick hike or afternoon jog with the Merino Wool Light Hiker Mini Crew socks from REI. Socks are made of merino lambswool with nylon and spandex for durability and a dependable fit. Merino wool wicks away moisture and breathes to regulate temperature for outstanding comfort. Stretch nylon reinforces heels and toes for durability and comfort; arch bands add support. Lin-Toe closures at the toes are seamless on the inside and have only a slight ridge on the outside for a smooth feel and great fit inside shoes. Light cushion. Seconds; item has minor cosmetic imperfections that do not affect product performance.
short_description: Keep your feet cool and comfortable on your next quick hike or afternoon jog with the Merino Wool Light Hiker Mini Crew socks from REI.
